definition: to speak/to explain/to negotiate/to emphasise/to be particular about/as far as sth is concerned/speech/lecture

sentences.english: Ng at the start of the session.
sentences.chinese: 這是吳醫生在講習會的開始所說的。

sentences.english: I attended one of Lewis’s group workshops in West London.
sentences.chinese: 我參加過一個路易斯在倫敦西部舉行的講習班。

sentences.english: What aspects of your district assembly program are already in place?
sentences.chinese: 你的地區講習會節目有哪些方面已經就緒？

sentences.english: Workshops and governmental bureaus were fully devoted to Shu Embroidery, promoting the development of the industry.
sentences.chinese: 局講習班和政府完全致力於蜀繡，促進行業的發展。

sentences.english: Will enhance the quality of Deacons through Ministers Post Systematic Seminar.
sentences.chinese: 透過長執系統化講習會來加強長執的品質。

sentences.english: As limited place, the Visiting is declined.
sentences.chinese: 因場地條件限制，本次講習會謝絕參觀。

sentences.english: Could you please explain for us the characteristics of idioms?
sentences.chinese: 您來給我們講一講習慣用語的特點，好嗎？

sentences.english: Have potential for future enhancements such as online payment of fees for membership, workshops, etc.
sentences.chinese: 增強對未來的潛力，如網上支付入會費，講習班等。

sentences.english: It was during the 2006 WSOP so the donkeys were out in full force .
sentences.chinese: 這是在2006年講習班所以驢子是在完全有效。

sentences.english: To inaugurate a course of vocal instruction, place the residence of the instructress .
sentences.chinese: 開始聲樂講習課程，地點在女教師的住所。

sentences.english: Help with writing English papers is also available in a writers’ workshop.
sentences.chinese: 而如何撰寫英文論文也可以在作家講習班獲得幫助。

sentences.english: What is the district Rotary Foundation seminar?
sentences.chinese: 什麼是地區扶輪基金講習會？

sentences.english: District governor-elect spouses applaud after an International Assembly panel presentation.
sentences.chinese: 總監當選人配偶們在國際講習會的專題演講之後鼓掌。

sentences.english: Mindmapping was an important part of the weekend course.
sentences.chinese: 週末講習班之一個重要內容就是心理測定。

sentences.english: What challenges have you faced in planning your district assembly?
sentences.chinese: 你在規劃地區講習會時面臨哪些困難？

sentences.english: For Popovic, the workshops make for a hectic schedule.
sentences.chinese: 對於波波維奇，講習班，爲繁忙的日程。

definition: Salvation Army (protestant philanthropic organization founded in London in 1865)
to train together/to practice as a group
to expire/to run out/to come to an end
